Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to first grade firefighters and promotions from the firefighter rank
Summary: Provides for longevity bonuses relating to first grade firefighters and promotions from the firefighter rank.
LawCode: Add ยง15-110.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to first grade firefighters and promotions from the firefighter rank
